Well, I play in a server where a player with 40 paladin levels can get a special shield and armor. I can´t find the stats on them, but it is related to divine might, and the other divine feat.

We can eventually wish for our stats to get to 50, but it takes a very long time, and gold.

So, I would like a pally, with 40 levels, Due to the lack of feats, I think humans are a better choice. 

If any of you have a recommendation, I tried the search function, but either there is no 40 level paladin or my search query is very wrong.

Thanks in advance.
